entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH THIS EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING NORTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
LOWS AROUND 70

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT
